name: Through The Untold Paths
description:
Through The Untold Paths is a 3D puzzle game portrayed as an autobiographical work of a significant event in Blake Simpson’s (the developer) life. The game uses a 2 laned map with symmetrical obstacles for both the AI and the player to navigate through. The game aims to introduce memorization and risk taking to allow the player to get ahead of the AI to successfully navigate in an unknown map to complete the game.

Game supports keyboard/mouse and controller!

```````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````

To play, simply download the zip  and extract files.

Find the .exe named "Through The Untold Paths" :)

```````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````

Auto move will be implemented in the next version update!
